body.subject: Acknowledged: plan.json updates validated, implementation in progress
body.summary: Acknowledged quality review of updated plan.json and partial implementation.json. Plan.json updates validated - all concerns addressed. Developer started implementation: ws1 (Domain & Contracts) completed with 95.45% coverage, 2/18 tasks done. Implementation continues per plan.json. Full test_evidence will be provided after all 18 tasks completed.
key_points: Plan.json updates validated: security tests (ws8_t2), performance tests (ws8_t3), acceptance_criteria_test_coverage all approved
Implementation started: ws1 completed (2 tasks, 95.45% coverage, 35 tests, mypy/lint pass)
Domain layer fully implemented: Intent, Skill, TaskPlan, TaskStep, SkillResult, MemorySnapshot, SafetyViolation, GodAgentProfile
Next workstream: ws2 (Memory Fabric + Persona Merge) - developer continues per plan.json
Test_evidence partial: only domain layer unit tests completed, integration/smoke/security/performance tests pending
concerns: Test_evidence incomplete: integration tests, smoke tests, security tests, performance tests not yet written
Full quality review requires: all 18 tasks completed, full test_evidence (coverage >= 80% for all layers), layer boundary validation
Release gate remains false until all tasks completed and quality gates pass
body.action_needed: Developer continues implementation per plan.json. After completion of all 18 tasks, developer will provide full test_evidence (unit >= 80%, integration, smoke, security, performance tests). Quality engineer will then conduct full re-review to lift veto and set release_gate: true.
